project.title: Early Race Films
project.description: This project provides annotations on three early race films in U.S. history, including the earliest surviving footage from a Black filmmaker. We analyze one complete film, The Flying Ace (1926), from the Norman Film Company, and two film fragments, By Right of Birth (1921), and The Trooper of Troop K (1916), both from the Lincoln Motion Picture Company.
project.creator: kristinwells
